Articles.Content: I have missions where I am losing money from the Outsourced R&D, but gaining no science because the money is so small. Is this just rounded for display purposes? Am I still getting the fraction of science I am supposed to?

As far as I know, all currencies are tracked with floating point numbers. You should never lose anything tangible to rounding.

A good way to check this is looking into your persistence file before and after completing in such a mission. You should see the un-truncated science number there.
